name: setName
shortDescription: Sets the name of a peer
description: This method sets the name of a peer or channel. The name makes it easier to identify the peer.
signatures: Void setName(Integer peerId, Integer channel, String name)

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer you want to set the name for

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel of the peer you want to set the name for (a channel of -1 sets the device's name). You can omit the channel when setting the name of the device.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name to assign to the device
